price: ߊ߬ ߞߵߊ߬ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߞߟߌ߫ ߏ߬ ߟߋ ߘߐ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߢߌ߲߬ ߠߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߡߌ߬ߙߌ߲߬ߘߌ߫ ߛߐ߲߬ߡߊ ߟߎ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߘߋ߬
arabic: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ قَوۡمٞ مُّجۡرِمُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: fadaʿā rabbahu anna hāulāi qawmun muj'rimūna
